name: Black-clad Youth
text:
Mmm~ ♪
Mmm-hmm-hmm-hmm~
Mmm-hmm-hmm~... ♪

name: Middle-aged Man
text:
—There you are!
Slipping away without learning your lesson,
won't you... return to your training?!

name: Black-clad Youth
text:
Gah, Gramps...?!
What are you doing— Guah?!

name: Middle-aged Man
text:
You truly are... what do you think this training ground is?
What about those new headphones?
You bribed the peddler again, didn't you?

name: Black-clad Youth
text:
That's right, Gramps!
Zero latency, perfect noise canceling!
The immersion is on a whole different level...

name: Middle-aged Man
text:
Fool!
It's an outrage for a half-wit who forgets to erase his presence to play truant!
Put your heart into training before your hobbies!

name: Black-clad Youth
text:
...............
Y-You're absolutely right...

name: Danzo
text:
A remote mountain village, untouched by humans for ages.
A hidden land that even high-precision satellites can't detect.
I was born in such a "Ninja Village."

name: Danzo
text:
The villagers, destined to become ninjas,
were rigid in their old-fashioned ways.
My master, Gramps, was actually one of the more lenient ones.

name: Danzo
text:
...No.
Both Gramps and I were anomalies, so we were outcasts in the village.
That's probably why Gramps paid special attention to me.

name: Danzo
text:
Even though I called him "Gramps", he was still under 50 at the time.
Generally, it was too early to call him an old man.
But for a ninja, he had lived quite a long life.

name: Gramps
text:
—Listen. You definitely have talent.
A truly exceptional talent as a ninja,
which cannot be explained by innate ability alone.

name: Gramps
text:
It's fine to have hobbies. But...
Don't you dare waste the gifts
you've been given.

name: Gramps
text:
My time, too, will likely not be long.
That's precisely why I want to impart
everything I can to you in the time we have left.

name: Gramps
text:
...I understand. But it's also true that you know no other path.
The "rules" that became a "curse" will follow you throughout your life.

name: Gramps
text:
But... even if you can't break the "rules",
it should be possible to transform them.
If you have overwhelming power and an unbending conviction.

name: Gramps
text:
I... believe that you can achieve that.
So, become a ninja of a new era,
with power that no one can deny.

name: Gramps
text:
Become a ninja worthy of inheriting the name "Danzo,"
and overturn everything about its existence.
You will create the ninjas of the future.

name: Danzo
text:
I still vividly remember the face he made when he smiled at me back then.
Gramps died on a mission shortly after I became independent.

name: Danzo
text:
It wasn't that I wanted to be a ninja.
But it was also true that
I knew no other way of life as a ninja.

name: Danzo
text:
With Gramps, the only one I respected, gone,
I was still alone even after inheriting the name "Danzo."
Day after day, I undertook missions
where my life was constantly at risk—

name: Danzo
text:
I spent harsh days where I felt like I was losing my mind,
to the point where I wished I could just become a machine.
One thing was my solace.

name: Danzo
text:
That was... music.
I always carried earphones with me,
and whenever I had free time, I immersed myself in music.
Thanks to this, I was able to remain "human."

name: Danzo
text: It... kept rich emotions within me.

name: Danzo
text:
—I'm sure more than anyone else...
I know how much music enriches the human heart.

name: Danzo
text:
That's precisely why I think.
This world, where people once abandoned entertainment
and now accept their impending end.

name: Danzo
text:
The factor necessary for the people
of this world to embrace hope once again.
That is, surely...
Chapter 4 - The Bringer of Pleasure

Leaving the first town, the group traversed the vast land,
following the traces of the "rift".
Beyond the serene rural landscape that stretched from the town.

There, they found a vast lake,
so grand it could be mistaken for the sea.
A wide sandy beach formed along the lakeside
welcomed [Player] and the others.

name: Hydoor
text:
Oh, I've been curious since I saw it in the distance, but...
This is great! It's huge and looks deep,
so it'll be worth swimming in!

name: Gnomon
text:
This is Lake Zuhaydal, the largest inland lake on the central continent.
There are many port towns along the coast,
as it's the main trade route with the eastern region.

name: Gnomon
text:
If we are to cross this lake,
we'll need to arrange for a boat...
I should look into that.

name: Hydoor
text:
H-Hey... we've walked a ton to get here!
Can't we just take a quick dip
to wash off the sweat, just for a bit!? Huh?!

options.text: I want to swim too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right? It's like his grumpy mood from yesterday was a lie!
His eyes are sparkling,
he's just like a kid. He's cute, isn't he?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey you guys, I can hear you!
...It can't be helped, can it?
I was born and raised by the sea!

options.text: Can't we just take a short break?
Hy-kun, you're the most energetic you've been lately.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right? It's like his grumpy mood from yesterday was a lie!
His eyes are sparkling,
he's just like a kid. He's cute, isn't he?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey you guys, I can hear you!
...It can't be helped, can it?
I was born and raised by the sea!

name: Gnomon
text:
Well... a quick dip is fine,
but we can't stay for too long.
The sun is already starting to set.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's still a bit of a distance
to the nearest port town.
If we want to avoid camping outdoors,
we need to get there.

name: Hydoor
text:
Huh? Can't we just move with 'magic'
like yesterday?
I'm done with flying through the sky, though.

name: Gnomon
text:
Using that 'magic' costs a lot.
It was my fault for being stubborn
and wasting materials, but...

name: Gnomon
text:
If we use it too much,
we might run out of funds at the crucial destination.
The 'magic' that can be used without cost is limited.

Saying that, Gnomon jingled the coin pouch hanging from his waist.
These were the coins he had bought at the market yesterday.

name: Danzo
text:
Those are Material Coins, you said?
I saw you casually tossing them into your staff
like putting coins in a vending machine.

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes. They are solidified materials,
minerals and Ether crystals, used to cast 'magic.'
My staff is compatible with coin shapes.

name: Gnomon
text:
You insert them as materials for substance conversion,
changing the type according to the 'magic' being used.
Then you declare the code to activate the 'magic.'

name: Gnomon
text: That's how it's used, so without this, advanced 'magic' cannot be used.

name: Gnomon
text:
Furthermore, the cost of materials is high,
making them very expensive.

options.text: Oh, that's how it worked.
It's so devoid of dreams...
How tough...

name: Hydoor
text: Seriously, your 'magic' has no resemblance of fairy tales or dreams...

name: Gnomon
text:
More importantly, is this alright?
While we're standing here,
the time we can spend here is decreasing.

name: Hydoor
text:
Oh, that's a waste!
Alright then, I'm going for a swim!
Yahooo!

options.text: Ah, no fair, I'm going too!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—How about you, Danzo-sama?
Either way, we'll be taking a break
until those two return.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Mmm~, it's a good invitation, but I'll pass!
Look, I'm full of mechanisms, you see?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If sand gets in the gaps, it's a pain to clean.
You go with Gnomon-kun, I'll wait here!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-I'll decline...
I... can't put my face in the water...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh my...
Another unexpected weakness.

options.text: He's really a creature of the water, isn't he?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—How about you, Danzo-sama?
Either way, we'll be taking a break
until Hydoor-sama returns.

options.text: You two should go too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Mmm~, it's a good invitation, but I'll pass!
Look, I'm full of mechanisms, you see?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If sand gets in the gaps, it's a pain to clean.
You go with Gnomon-kun, I'll wait here!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-I'll decline...
I... can't put my face in the water...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh my...
Another unexpected weakness.

text:
A moment of respite amidst the heavy responsibility
of saving the world.
The group briefly enjoyed the refreshing waters.

Hydoor's expression, which had been a bit nervous,
finally softened, and we saw a beaming smile.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hah hah, this is the best!
After all, swimming in real water
is the most refreshing thing for the soul!

name: Gnomon
text:
You really are... incredibly excited.
You're probably the most
high-spirited person in this world right now.

name: Hydoor
text:
What, are you making fun of me?!
Guys like you... take this!
I'll get you!

name: Gnomon
text:
Whoa?! Hey,
don't splash me!
I'm—whoa!

name: Danzo
text:
Haha, like a fish in water, right?!
It's good, let's have fun like this!
Right, Hy-kun!

name: Danzo
text:
—What this world needs right now,
is the spirit to smile like that.
At least, that's what I think...

After calling out to Hydoor,
Danzo muttered to himself,
dropping his voice so no one could hear.

options.text: Danzo?
Did you say something...?

name: Danzo
text:
—N-No, it's nothing.
Ahh, I wish I'd brought my swimsuit!
It looks like so much fun!

—And then, night.
Having safely arrived at their destination,
and finished their meal, they entered the inn.

[Player] prepared for bed
and slipped into the soft sheets.

The private room was surprisingly quiet.
Perhaps because it was a world without music,
hardly any of the city's hustle and bustle could be heard.

options.text: Ahh, I'm completely exhausted today.
Is it okay to relax this much...?
Splashing around was fun...

text:
As they tried to give in to their exhaustion,
their mind tried to process various pieces of information,
making it difficult to fall asleep.

Just as they thought sleep was finally coming...
a sound from somewhere reached [Player]'s ears.

It was a kind of melody
that had been almost entirely absent
since coming to this world.

options.text: Is this... music?
Is that the sound of a harmonica...?

text:
The sound seemed to be coming from beyond the window.
[Player] got out of bed and opened the window.

From the upper floor of the two-story inn.
Looking left, right, and down,
no human figures or sources of the sound could be found.

However, the harmonica's melody was still audible.
This time, they leaned out slightly and looked up at the roof.

Then, Danzo was there.
He was holding something to his mouth,
playing a melody.

It was hidden by his large hands,
but it was probably a harmonica.

options.text: Danzo!

name: Danzo
text:
...Hm?
Oh, [Player]-kun?!
Did I perhaps wake you up?

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm, I thought it would be better than inside the room,
but I guess it was a mistake...
Ahh, my bad, my bad!

name: Danzo
text:
Well, since you're here, why don't you come up!
The night breeze feels pretty good, you know?

As Danzo effortlessly pulled them up,
[Player] also ascended to the roof.

In Danzo's hand,
an old harmonica was firmly clutched.

options.text: You had that with you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, yeah~. I don't usually
show it to people, but it's my secret item.
I surprisingly like analog instruments too, you know?

options.text: What were you doing?
How are you playing the harmonica?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Um, conversely, let me ask you.
How do you think I eat?

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 3]

options.text: Um... what were you doing?
You, uh, had something like that?

dialogue_after_selection.text: [Go back to Option 1 of the choice above]

name: Danzo
text:
I was... making a song with this.
Paper and pen, it's surprising how they remain
in any era, isn't it?

On the roof, where they had climbed at Danzo's invitation.
There were many sheets of paper
spread out, densely covered with musical chords and staves.

options.text: A song...?
Why now, again...?

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm... I'm not really good at talking about myself...
But, well, if it's with you, boss,
then it's fine. I want you to know.

name: Danzo
text:
—You see, I'm probably more into music than anyone realizes.
Enough to beg for something like this when I was a kid, you know?

As he said that,
Danzo fiddled with the small harmonica
in his hand.

name: Danzo
text:
This... was the first thing my master,
Gramps, bought for me as a reward for working hard on my training.

name: Danzo
text:
See, in this world where music has faded,
there's no way to get anything that resembles an instrument, right?

name: Danzo
text:
That's why I've been using this.
Somehow, I've grown attached to it and can't let it go.
I always carry it with me.

name: Danzo
text:
—Well, if my Gramps, who was like a parent to me,
knew, he'd probably lament where I've stored it!

Joking around, Danzo
tapped the mechanized parts of
his arms and legs.

options.text: It's something important to you, isn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Eh, you responded with a serious tone.
Well, that's true, though.
Alright... I'll continue talking.

options.text: It's hard to laugh at this.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh~, harsh!
When I try to talk about myself, I get really dull!
...Well, I'll just keep talking obediently.

options.text: Danzo, continue seriously.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
S-Sorry!
I'm really bad at talking about myself, so please forgive me!
...Well, I'll just keep talking obediently.

name: Danzo
text:
I've been immersed in music ever
since I had a 100% flesh and blood body.

name: Danzo
text:
I listened to it constantly between missions.
On my days off, just listening wasn't enough,
so I started writing my own songs.

name: Danzo
text:
Thanks to that, thanks to that,
I was able to remain "human-like," I guess.

options.text: Human-like...?

name: Danzo
text:
Yeah. Like retaining rich emotions,
having peace of mind, or holding onto dreams and hopes.
Those positive and forward-looking emotions, you know?

name: Danzo
text:
When you're constantly on missions
where life and death are on the line...
you really start to lose those things.

name: Danzo
text:
Like, it'd be better to just become a machine.
But music always pulled me back to being "human."

name: Danzo
text:
Even when I actually died once,
and more than half of my body became mechanical...
It was music that saved *me*.

name: Danzo
text:
It allowed me to stop being a famous ninja's "23rd generation",
and filled me up when I was empty...
It also gave me a way to live.

name: Danzo
text:
It allowed me to regain
such an overflowing sense of "humanity"
that I could even give dreams to other people.

name: Danzo
text:
—Well, after a lot of things,
I ended up coming back to being a ninja.
The reason I'm still making music is...

name: Danzo
text:
It's because of that gratitude towards music.
I believe it's an important factor
for enriching people's hearts.

options.text: Music is why Danzo is who he is now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Right.
That's why I think what this world needs now is music.

options.text: ...Hm? 23rd generation...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right~. Well, I think the title stopped being mine
the moment I died once, so it's fine now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Personally,
I think what this world needs now is music.

name: Danzo
text:
If I brought music back to this world,
which is filled with such gloomy air,
wouldn't everyone's faces brighten up a bit—

name: Danzo
text:
I just casually thought about this
after seeing the reactions of the people who watched my battle.
This is just what I personally think, but...

Saying that, Danzo looked up at the sky.
His tone and the expression on his display were more serious than usual.

name: Danzo
text:
Whether we can return to our original world from the "rift"
is something we won't know until we go.
Whether we can close the "rift" is even more uncertain.

name: Danzo
text:
But... I really hope that after
everything succeeds and we return to our original world,
this world will be overflowing with smiles.

name: Danzo
text:
To sow that seed...
I want to revive music in this world and spread it.

—Just then.
A faint red light lit up on [Player]'s terminal.

options.text: ...Huh?

name: Danzo
text:
But you know~~~!
Just wishing won't do anything!
That's why I'm painstakingly making songs, you know?

name: Danzo
text:
I've been thinking about what kind of music would be
suitable as the first music to be revived in this world,
and I've completely gotten lost in a maze of thoughts~!

name: Danzo
text:
Besides, even if I make a song,
how am I going to deliver it?
Of course, playing it live during battles
is the quickest way, but...

name: Danzo
text:
Weed Groover's equipment, that thing
remixes and plays stock audio,
so it can't be used to perform new songs.

name: Danzo
text:
So, should I just do it with a harmonica?
No, it might be easy for music beginners to understand,
but it's still a bit lonely, isn't it...?

Danzo, talking volubly but also with his arms crossed,
groaned.
From him, signals continued to be received intermittently.

The situation was slightly different, but—
The display was very similar to
when a strong desire different from usual was detected.

options.text: —Danzo.

name: Danzo
text:
Yes? What is it, boss—?!
What happened to that terminal?!
I feel like I've seen that kind of light somewhere before...!

options.text: If you really put your all into wish...
Your troubles can be solved.

name: Danzo
text:
...Is that true?!
You mean you can respond so flexibly, boss?!

name: Danzo
text:
Indeed, I've heard rumors, you know?
The rumor that you, boss,
can temporarily switch your transformed appearance.

name: Danzo
text:
But can you really do that on the fly?
Well, if it's true...
then I'd be incredibly grateful, you know?

options.text: I think I can do it.
Don't worry, leave it to me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, you're saying something!
Saying that means
you'll do exactly as I wish, right?

options.text: Don't you believe your future master?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, you're saying something!
Saying that means
you'll do exactly as I wish, right?

name: Danzo
text:
—Alright!
Then I'll leave it to you!
I'm counting on you, boss!

options.text: Okay, here I go!
Transform!

text:
In response to Danzo's plea,
[Player] observed Danzo's new potential. And then—

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
...Ohh?!
Th-This is—amazing!!
We did it, boss!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Heh, I see... so this is the form my current wish takes.
Mhm, mhm, this will work, in fact, it's almost too perfect!

options.text: It... it worked!
Is there anything else I can help with?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Ah, so for you, boss,
it was quite a gamble too, huh?
Well, all's well that ends well!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Right... since we're here, and you've observed this form,
perhaps I could ask for your help with songwriting?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Let's do a collaboration!
Let's create together, the first arrow to revive music in this world...

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text: The most fitting song, you hear me!

options.text: OK, let's do it!
C-Can I really do it...?!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's alright, it's alright!
I'm a professional, so I'm with you!
It's easy to get stuck when you're doing it alone!

text:
Together with Danzo, they pondered lyrics and composed music.
On the paper, once filled with messy scribbles—

A perfectly arranged score was created.
As they did so, the night deepened.

—The next morning.
[Player] and the others quickly finished their preparations and left the inn.
Then...

name: Yellow Larva
text:
Gugagagaga!!
Gigyaaaaah!!

As if to greet them,
monsters appeared on the street ahead,
beginning to attack people.

name: Hydoor
text:
Whoa, what terrible timing?!
Do monsters just pop up
that frequently in this world?!

name: Gnomon
text:
I wonder... I lived secluded in the mansion for so long,
so I don't really know much about that.

name: Gnomon
text:
However, as I mentioned yesterday,
there are few heroes in this world.
There's no reason why we shouldn't deal with this.

name: Hydoor
text:
—Damn it. If it were a villain,
I might still... but this is no time
to be saying things like that!

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, [Player]!
Let's do it, transform me!

options.text: O-Okay... yawn~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-Hey, are you alright...?
Your eyes look glazed over.
Did you even get any sleep?

options.text: Let's do it!! Let's definitely defeat them!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
O-Oh... are you alright?
Your tension is insane.
Did you even get any sleep?

options.text: I stayed up too late and I'm still sleepy...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, snap out of it!
The monsters won't care about your condition!

name: Hydoor
text:
—Alright!!
What, if it comes down to it,
we'll just fight bare-handed!!

name: Gnomon
text:
He's truly a belligerent one... [Player]-sama.
Please assist
with my transformation as well.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Thank you.
They're just small fries.
Let's finish this quickly and move on.

name: Danzo
text:
I think you're quite something too,
I mean... alright!
Shall we do this, [Player]-kun!

name: Danzo
text:
The brand new suit I just observed!
The super new song that was just made!!
Let's show it off right away!

options.text: Okay!
Eh, you're using it already!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This kind of thing is all about speed!
There's no point in holding back!
Come on, I'm counting on you!!

options.text: Can he fight with that...!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course!
Do you think I'd wish for a form that had oversights?

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, what are you talking about...?
A brand new suit, a super new song.
I don't understand.

name: Danzo
text:
Now, now, just watch and listen!
—Transform!!

name: Mobile Device
text:
—Would you like to connect to the 'path'?
To begin operation, please tap "OK".

options.text: OK

text:
With [Player]'s approval,
Danzo transformed into the new form
he had acquired last night.

A coat with a long tailcoat-like length,
a hat with a brim that spreads like wings.
On his shoulder, a heavily built electric guitar.

His appearance, marked by chic colors and
flashy accents and ornaments,
was indeed a "traveling outfit" typical of Danzo.

options.text: That outfit is still cool!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heh heh, thanks!
I'm going to show off
my coolness that's more than just looks!

options.text: A bard, with an electric guitar...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, now?!
Come on, don't say anything uncool!
It's fine to have a traveling entertainer playing electric guitar, right?!

options.text: Ah, his chest is poison for my eyes...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey, what are you staring at?
Well, I am showing off though!
You can stare until you burn a hole through me, you know?

name: Gnomon
text:
...!
His appearance is different from before...?
What in the world is this...!

name: Hydoor
text:
Whoa, when did you do that?!
You didn't show us that form until yesterday!
What's going on?!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Well, just a little something last night!
More importantly, let's start the session quickly!
The floor seems to be warmed up too, right?

name: Yellow Larva
text:
Gyagogogo!!
Gueeh...!

The monsters that were attacking the townspeople
gathered, seemingly having noticed their presence.

name: Gnomon
text:
...We are starting a battle, is that right?
If so, then certainly.

name: Hydoor
text:
Tch...!
You better explain everything when this is over!

Glowering at the monsters, Danzo
extended a cable from his electric guitar to his back,
connecting it somewhere.
He then strummed the strings.

After confirming that sound was coming from the amplifier at his waist,
he put on a smiling expression and declared loudly:

name: Danzo
text:
Alright—let's begin!!
Lend me your ears, audience!

name: Danzo
text:
This world, music is coming back!
Raise your voices and your arms, and get hyped!
Let's Roooooooooock!!!
Battle Start

name: Danzo
text:
Yeeeah—hoooo!!!
Are you listening, WORLD!!?
Is our message reaching you!!

name: Danzo
text:
The power of music isn't just this!
We'll illuminate the future
that you all once gave up on, thoroughly and perfectly!

Using a kunai like a pick,
Danzo sang the song he had created with [Player],
while playing his guitar.

As the lyrics ended and the interlude began,
Danzo's guitar solo abruptly started.
Then—

name: Yellow Larva
text:
G-Gaga...!
Gyah...!

The sound waves literally became
"waves" traveling through the air,
trapping the monsters and slowing their movements.
Immediately after—

name: Hydoor
text:
—Oraa,
take this!

name: Gnomon
text:
—Combo, 3!
Shoot!

name: Yellow Larva
text:
Bigaga!
Gwaaah...!

Hydoor swiftly approached the monsters and struck them.
Next, Gnomon fired fireballs as a follow-up.

With the two moving with a lighter step
than before, the monsters
disappeared one after another.

options.text: Th-This is also the power of music...?!
Was there such a guitar solo!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's improv, improv!!
It's a staple of live shows, right?!
Let's keep the excitement going to the very end!

options.text: It's a song we made together, so it's a bit embarrassing...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There's nothing to be embarrassed about!
Rather, let's be proud and spread it, our song!

name: Gnomon
text:
Amazing... It's like my body is moving along with the sound.
It's like something is welling up from deep within my body.

name: Hydoor
text:
Anyone would be like that when music is played with such enthusiasm!
He's really something, that guy!

name: Hydoor
text: —Tch...

Hydoor used an anchor
to finish off a monster
he had missed with his fist.

name: Red Larva
text:
Giga!
Guga...

name: Yellow Larva
text:
Gyagya!
Gwaaah!!

name: Hydoor
text:
...Tch! Still there!
Can't catch up...!

name: Gnomon
text:
Step back, Hydoor-sama.
—Shoot!

name: Yellow Larva
text:
Gyagu!
Gugugu...

name: Gnomon
text:
—Are you alright?
Please leave anything out of reach to me.
I'll take care of it.

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah, oh... sorry.
...Damn it.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—Oh, oh!
This is fan service!
Take it!

name: Purple Larva
text:
Guga, gaga!
Gaga...

In that brief moment when he let go of his guitar,
Danzo threw a kunai at a monster
that was out of Hydoor and Gnomon's sight.

options.text: Ah, so you can use it like that too.
It's a kunai and a pick...?!
Is that fan service?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Come on, it's not just this!
It's a refrain until peace returns!!
Make sure you keep up, alright!?

Finishing the long guitar solo interlude,
Danzo began to sing the rest of the song.

This world's ViewPower, whatever it was called,
was continuously supplied.
Cheerful voices began to rise from the distant crowd.

The surprise live performance, featuring
the debut of a new song while defeating monsters,
was now reaching its climax.

After the battle ended and they had dealt with
the excited crowd that had gathered,
the group walked towards the outskirts of the town.

name: Danzo
text:
Yeahh, I feel amazing!
It was a huge success,
I didn't expect everyone to get so hyped!

options.text: The moment it ended, there was a huge cheer, wasn't there?
I'm tired from being jostled by so many people...
I'm glad everyone had fun.

text:
[Player] recalled the words of
the excited crowd that had gathered.

name: Townsperson
text:
It was the first time in my life
I felt such power surging from deep within my body!!
It was amazing!!

name: Townsperson
text:
I never thought sound
could make my heart tremble like that!!
It was my first time experiencing a battle like this!!

name: Townsperson
text:
Hey, hey, more!
Let me hear more!!
My ears had so much fun!!

options.text: This world really craved music, didn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course! After all, living beings can't live without a beat.
I'm so satisfied to have confirmed that!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
And all of this is thanks to you, boss, for observing that cool new form!
Seriously, thank you!

options.text: Your wish seems to be coming true, Danzo.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah! Seriously, thank you for observing that super cool form, boss!

options.text: We need to deliver a lot more music, don't we?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text: Of course! Since you, boss, observed this cool form for me, there's no way I can't make use of it!

name: Danzo
text:
Alright!!
At this rate, I'll deliver music
to the whole world!!

name: Gnomon
text:
Was that "music"...?
Indeed, I too felt power
from those layered sounds.

name: Gnomon
text:
To be able to make so many people smile...
It's truly wonderful.

name: Hydoor
text:
You really can't underestimate the power of a song, you know?
Like, getting everyone there hyped up—

name: Hydoor
text:
Or strengthening the bonds between comrades.
In our world, it's a huge success.
I never thought I'd recall that power here.

name: Hydoor
text:
But still... I can't believe
you got that form overnight.
And why did you hide it until just now?

options.text: It's not like I was hiding it...
More like there wasn't an opportunity to talk about it...
More like Danzo told me not to say anything.

name: Danzo
text:
Ah, sorry, sorry.
I was the one who suggested we surprise
those two since we had the chance.

name: Hydoor
text:
You suggested it?!
And you really hid it?!
What's the point of that surprise!!

name: Danzo
text:
Well, well, isn't it fine!
For me, getting to see their fresh reactions
was super satisfying, you know? It just fills me up.

name: Hydoor
text:
He really has a good personality...
His true intentions are completely unreadable.

name: Danzo
text:
Thank you for the compliment!
Speaking of true intentions, Hy-kun,
aren't you holding something back too?

name: Danzo
text:
Your movements in battle—
I feel like there's some kind of hesitation.

name: Hydoor
text:
...?!
N-No, that's not...!

name: Danzo
text:
No, it's not hesitation...
More like you're having trouble handling your weapon,
or it feels awkward, something like that?

options.text: Is that true, Hydoor?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-How do you know that...?
What in the world are you...?

options.text: Indeed, you did seem to be struggling a bit.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-How do you know that too...?
What in the world are you two, really...?

text:
Hydoor sighed, then
began to confess as if resigned.

name: Hydoor
text:
...It's nothing.
My current fighting style with this weapon
isn't really effective against monsters.

name: Hydoor
text:
In fact, I just realized it's a disadvantage.
Monsters don't care about being in water, you see.

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, right!
Hy-kun's parallel weapon changes the terrain, right?

name: Hydoor
text:
—To be precise, I create my "sea"
up to the point where the rope is anchored.
I make it the battlefield where I can move best.

name: Hydoor
text:
This works well against opponents like villains.
No one can beat me when it comes to swimming, you see.

name: Hydoor
text:
But... when it's monsters, that's a different story.
Those guys don't drown or get tripped up by water.

name: Hydoor
text:
So in the end, it comes down to hitting them
with the rope's anchor or fighting bare-handed.
It's not much different from a regular brawl, right?

name: Gnomon
text:
...I see. So that's why
it was clearly harder for you to fight
than when you were against me.

name: Hydoor
text:
I've been fighting humans more than monsters for a long time...
So I'm just not very good at fighting monsters.

options.text: For a long time...?
Oh, right, Hydoor, you mentioned that...

name: Hydoor
text:
—Yeah. Back then,
I was a pirate villain on your planet's ocean.
Well... I got caught once and now I'm clean.

name: Hydoor
text:
When I was stealing things,
monsters never got in the way.
That's how it was.

name: Gnomon
text:
Ah, so you were originally a bandit.
...That explains it.

name: Hydoor
text:
"That explains it," what do you mean?!
What did you just understand?!

options.text: What about your weapon back then?
Was it a different weapon than now?

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah—how was it, I wonder.
It's been longer since I got this weapon. <
But I feel like it was different at first.

name: Hydoor
text:
Regardless of whether I'm transformed or not,
I've tried various weapons...
Guns, grappling hooks, swords. And—

Oh, there you are!
Hey, heroes!
I've been looking for you!

—Just then.
From behind the group, who were about to leave the town,
a loud voice called out to them.

...Phew, good thing I made it!
I went to where the monster disturbance was,
and the people themselves had already left!

This town is big, you know,
and it wasn't easy searching around
while carrying all this luggage...!

The speaker—a person dressed like a craftsman—
set down the basket he was carrying.
Inside it were guns, grappling hooks, swords...

Various weapons were stored within.
Placing a hand on an axe larger than any other weapon in the basket,
the person snorted.

options.text: That's a huge axe!
Um... are you a weapon merchant?
Oh, your belongings are intimidating, but you're beautiful...!

name: Gnomon
text:
Um... who are you?
You were looking for us...?

That's right! I'm a weapons artisan,
and I'm interested in your weapons!
Especially—you!

The weapons artisan's finger
pointed directly at Hydoor.

name: Hydoor
text:
M-Me?!
What about my weapon?!

I've seen hundreds, thousands of blades, so I can tell.
Your weapon, its form is incredibly beautiful, but—

You're having trouble handling it, aren't you?
You're struggling to use it
to its full potential... isn't that right?

name: Hydoor
text:
O-Oh?!
Is it that obvious even to a commoner?!

name: Danzo
text:
No, they're not just any commoner.
This artisan... has a very keen eye, don't they?

Of course!
—Well, it's not a good idea
to spread out weapons here...

I apologize for stopping you on your journey, but
would you mind dropping by my guild?
Everyone's really curious about you!

options.text: A guild...?
